introSection.title: Using crypto to target social protection

subTitle.firstSection: Proof of Integrity is a decentralized and non-profit protocol to certify humans needing a basic income.
subTitle.secondSection: We are integrated with the Proof of Humanity initiative, and our vision is to onboard every human in need to the platform.

banner.title: Urgent Needs Require Urgent Answers
banner.bubble1: There are at least 1.3 billion people experiencing poverty worldwide.
banner.bubble2: 788 million people share household with one or more undernourished person.
banner.descriptionItem1: Make a career in a crypto organization that fights poverty with total transparency.

aboutPOI.descriptionFirstParagraph: With a rewards system based on Game Theory, our protocol will certify who struggles to cover their basic needs in a decentralized and transparent way. Once certified, applicants will be eligible for different philanthropy programs.
aboutPOI.descriptionSecondParagraph: Every program will publish clear criteria for eligibility, entry and exit, and pre-transparent mechanisms for establishing benefit levels.
aboutPOI.descriptionThirdParagraph: A combination of Proof of Work, Proof of Stake, and Schelling Points will be applied to incentivize social workers (Certifiers) to do a good job.
